mapper.select: SELECT tt.nick_name , tt.mobile , tt.sex , tt.birthday , a.`name` AS city , tt.achievement_val , tt.integration_val , tt.badge_count , tt.designation FROM ( SELECT t.nick_name , t.mobile , t.sex , t.birthday , t.city , t.achievement_val , t.integration_val , t.badge_count , t.designation FROM t_user t WHERE t.mobile IS NOT NULL AND t.mobile like #{mobile} AND t.city like #{city} ) tt LEFT JOIN sys_city a ON tt.city = a.id
